bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully butted, formed TT, double ORE DT, externally relieved HT, reinforced disc mount, forged dropouts w/ replaceable 98954020 hanger

components.description: SR Suntour SF8-XCT-V2, 80mm, 1pc. alloy lower, 28mm Hi-Ten stanchions, 13-15": standard spring, all others: "stiff" spring, coil/mcu spring w/ preload adj., spring assisted seals, disc only
Specialized alloy, 25mm rise, 640mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 8 degree up sweep, 3.2mm thick
Specialized Enduro, dual compound Kraton, no flange, 131mm
KMC X8 w/ reuseable Missing Link
Shimano BB-ES25, Octalink spline, cartridge bearing, 68mm x 113mm
Specialized RH, 26", pinned, alloy double wall, CNC sidewalls, 32h
Specialized Hi Lo, forged alloy, double sealed, ground race, 32h
Shimano FH-RM30 forged alloy, cassette, QR, 32h
Specialized Fast Trak LK Sport, 26x2.0", 60TPI, wire bead
Specialized Fast Trak LK Sport, 26x2.0", 60TPI, wire bead
Specialized XC, Body Geometry, 143mm width, front and rear bumpers
Specialized alloy two bolt, no offset, micro adjust, 30.9mm
